docs.text: Gregory Falkovich Title: Mathematical Aspects of Turbulence Abstract: I shall review two unsolved mathematical problems related to turbulence. The first one is the broken scale invariance and an anomalous scaling in direct turbulent cascades. The second one is an emerging conformal invariance in inverse turbulent cascades.
